name: Englease Technologies SPV Ltd
description: Provider of an online educational platform intended to prepare for English proficiency tests. The company's platform offers one-to-one sessions that assist users in tracking their progress, consolidating their learning and making time to assess their future learning needs, and providing online courses for preparing for exams like IELTS and TOEFL, enabling users in the MENA region to improve their fluency in English.
one_liner: Provider of an online educational platform intended to prepare for English proficiency tests. The company's platform offers one-to-one sessions that assist users in tracking their progress, consolidating their learning and making time to assess their future learning needs, and providing online courses for preparing for exams like IELTS and TOEFL, enabling users in the MENA region to improve their fluency in English.
